---

**Important! Does a similar Plugin already exist?**
Make sure to check if a similar plugin already exists using the Plugins page. If it does already exist, please open an "enhancement" issue in the Plugin repo.

**Describe the purpose of the Plugin**
A clear and concise description of what the Plugin should do.

**Describe interactions with other Plugins**
Are there any existing Plugins the new Plugin should Interact with. What interactions do you have in mind?

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
